page.title: 15DORSINGTON CHURCH
page.content: Shaun Garrod and Paul Longford investigated Dorsington Church..... We found out that the whole of Dorsington is based on the church and it is the only organisation in the village. Dorsington does not have a Sunday school because there are only 73 people in the village. Other vicars do work in the church but only when the Reverend Llewellyn Powell is ill or on holiday. The vicar holds services once every Sunday. The church is one hundred and eighty five years old. The roof of the church has been repaired once. Reverend Powell is an archictect but being a vicar takes up most of his time. He was ordained in nineteen seventy. He enjoys all services but mostly those with young people.
